TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GetAttachmentType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

summary.span: 类表示一个请求以获取 Exchange 数据库中的附加的项目和项目上的文件。

span.span: The class represents a request to get attached items and files on an item in an Exchange database.

span.para: 使用 GetItem 调用来获取要在 GetAttachment 操作中使用的附件标识符。
Use the GetItem call to get the attachment identifiers to use in the GetAttachment operation.
下面的代码示例显示两个附件的附件 get 请求。
The following code example shows a get attachment request for two attachments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 构造函数初始化的新实例类。

span.span: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ AttachmentIds { cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置在响应中返回的附件的标识符。

span.span: The property gets or sets the identifiers of the attachments to return in the response.

value.span: 属性返回标识要返回的附件的数组。

span.span: The property returns a array that identifies the attachments to return.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::AttachmentResponseShapeType ^ AttachmentShape { ExchangeWebServices::AttachmentResponseShapeType ^ get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::AttachmentResponseShapeType ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置要返回的附件的其他属性。

span.span: The property gets or sets which additional properties to return for the attachments.

value.span: 属性返回，它标识要返回的附件的其他属性。

span.span: The property returns an that identifies which additional properties to return for attachments.
